sections: Who will be the new lucky owner of this insane Audi R8 V10 coupe which boast incredible performance and a beautiful exterior.

become incredibly famous for its work in pioneering some of the world's most excellent German racing, utility, and luxury vehicles to ever hit the roads of Europe. One significant facet of this incredible reputation is the division of the Audi design team, which has been responsible for producing some of the most internationally acclaimed sports coupes and mighty, lightweight, high-performance cars. A prevalent model that follows that distinction quite well is the Audi R8 which quickly became the world's favorite German supercar after its initial release in 2006. These great cars were insanely popular, and the R8 name still holds strong to this day. So what if you want to get your hands on an R8 of
is the perfect answer to that question. Powering this beautiful 2012

is an insanely powerful 5.2-liter V10 that sends 525 horsepower through a six-speed gated manual transmission. That powertrain allows the driver to utilize every bit of speed that this car has to give and ensure that you will always have fun driving this beast. In addition, the odometer reads a mere 19,000 miles, which means that this piece of German engineering will be around for decades to come. Another feature that virtually guarantees the reliability of this crazy car is the fact that it has been garage-kept and regularly maintained by the owner.

is like nothing else on the road as it is an Audi exclusive color which makes this car extremely rare and desirable. On the inside of the vehicle, you'll find the enhanced leather package, making for an exceptionally comfortable and stylish ride. Other excellent options include the Carbon Fiber Sigma trim, illuminated door sill inserts, and many more features that make this vehicle very valuable. Of course, this car will not be up for auction for very long, as we're sure that many German automotive enthusiasts would be overjoyed to get behind the wheel of this beast. So, you had better hurry to get your hands on this incredible European supercar.
